content.text:
# List of presidents of the Bundestag

The President of the Bundestag (') presides over the sessions of the German parliament, the Bundestag. Since the introduction of the office in 1949, thirteen people held the office. President of the current 21st Bundestag is, since 25 March 2025, Julia Klöckner (CDU).
